rule.name: AS_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionFulfilledMetadata
rule.description: Rule used to calculate the fulfillment metadata for a question and its fields
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!questionMetadata: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_QuestionMetadata'( questionId: ri!question.questionId, showWhen: ri!questionMetadata.showWhen, required: ri!questionMetadata.required, valid: ri!questionMetadata.valid, fieldMetadata: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata, expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_FieldMetadata'( fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey, showWhen: fv!item.showWhen, required: fv!item.required, valid: fv!item.valid, fulfilled: if( fv!item.required, if( fv!item.valid, #"_a-0000e447-91f4-8000-9bc0-011c48011c48_571333"( question: ri!question, questionMetadata: ri!questionMetadata, fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey ), false ), null ) ) ) ), if( ri!questionMetadata.required, #"_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_260165"( cdt: local!questionMetadata, fields: "fulfilled", newValues: and( local!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata.fulfilled ) ), local!questionMetadata ) )
